name: Spring Creek
description: Famous limestone spring creek running through State College. All-tackle trophy section. Year-round fishing.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent Hendrickson and Sulphur hatches. Spring stocking in March-April.
seasonal.summerNotes: Trico hatches in early morning. Water stays cool year-round.
seasonal.fallNotes: Blue-Winged Olive hatches. Fall stocking in October.
seasonal.winterNotes: Year-round fishing. Midge hatches throughout winter.

hatches.notes: One of the first major hatches of spring
Year-round hatch, especially important in winter

name: Yellow Breeches Creek
description: Premier limestone spring creek. One of PA best trout streams with wild and stocked fish.

seasonal.springNotes: Hendrickson hatch in late April. Excellent spring fishing.
seasonal.fallNotes: Fall stocking and Blue-Winged Olive hatches.

hatches.notes: One of the first major hatches of spring

name: Big Spring Creek
description: Small but productive limestone spring creek. Trophy trout section.

hatches.notes: One of the first major hatches of spring

name: Penns Creek
description: Freestone stream with excellent insect hatches. One of PA premier wild trout streams.

seasonal.springNotes: Grannom hatch in mid-April. March Brown in late March.
seasonal.summerNotes: Isonychia hatch in June. Excellent dry fly fishing.

name: Loyalsock Creek
description: Scenic mountain stream with quality trout and bass fishing.

seasonal.summerNotes: Good bass fishing in lower sections.

name: Pine Creek
description: Pennsylvania Grand Canyon stream with diverse fishing opportunities.

seasonal.springNotes: Brook trout in headwaters. Spring stocking.
seasonal.fallNotes: Fall colors make this a beautiful time to fish.

name: Tulpehocken Creek
description: Excellent trout stream with cold water releases from Blue Marsh Dam.

seasonal.springNotes: Year-round fishing due to cold water releases.
seasonal.summerNotes: Stays cool even in summer. Excellent fishing.

name: Raystown Lake
description: PA largest lake with exceptional multi-species fishing. 30 miles long, 200 feet deep.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent bass fishing. Walleye spawn in April.
seasonal.summerNotes: Deep water fishing for bass and walleye. Topwater action.
seasonal.fallNotes: Excellent fall fishing. Muskie season peaks.

name: Lake Erie - Presque Isle Bay
description: World-class fishing for walleye and perch with protected bay habitat.

seasonal.springNotes: Walleye spawn in April. Excellent spring fishing.
seasonal.summerNotes: Perch fishing peaks. Smallmouth bass active.
seasonal.fallNotes: Steelhead runs begin. Excellent fall fishing.
seasonal.winterNotes: Ice fishing for perch and walleye.

name: Lake Wallenpaupack
description: Large reservoir with rocky shorelines, submerged timber, and deep basins.

seasonal.springNotes: Bass spawn in May. Excellent spring fishing.
seasonal.summerNotes: Deep water fishing. Topwater action early and late.

name: Letort Spring Run
description: Famous limestone spring creek. Challenging fishing for selective trout.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent spring hatches. Very selective trout.

hatches.notes: Terrestrial pattern, important in late summer

hatches.color: Tan or olive body, mottled wings
